title.default: Which of the following is most useful for your related to Scheduler functionality?
title.nl: Welke van de volgende is het meest nuttig voor uw gerelateerde Scheduler-functionaliteit?

choices.value: The ability to view schedules by day

text.default: The ability to view schedules by day
text.nl: De mogelijkheid om schema's per dag te bekijken

choices.value: The ability to view schedules by week

text.default: The ability to view schedules by week
text.nl: De mogelijkheid om schema's per week te bekijken

choices.value: The ability to view schedules by month

text.default: The ability to view schedules by month
text.nl: De mogelijkheid om schema's per maand te bekijken

title.default: What new features would you like added to the Scheduler functionality?
title.nl: Welke nieuwe functies wilt u toevoegen aan de Scheduler-functionaliteit?

choices.value: The ability to filter by status (Success, Fail, Scheduled)

text.default: The ability to filter by status (Success, Fail, Scheduled)
text.nl: De mogelijkheid om te filteren op status (Geslaagd, Mislukt, Gepland)

choices.value: The ability to filter by flow name

text.default: The ability to filter by flow name
text.nl: De mogelijkheid om te filteren op stroomnaam

choices.value: The ability to filter by machine / machine group

text.default: The ability to filter by machine / machine group
text.nl: De mogelijkheid om te filteren op machine / machinegroep

label.default: Do you want to send the feedback on Scheduler?
label.nl: Wil je de feedback op Scheduler sturen?

html.default: We look forward to getting your feedback. As a core Automation Kit team we use the feedback to improving our guidance and roadmap
html.nl: We kijken uit naar uw feedback. Als kernteam van Automation Kit gebruiken we de feedback om onze begeleiding en roadmap te verbeteren.

title.default: Did you have any other feedback?
title.nl: Heb je nog andere feedback gehad?
